document_data.\"Answered Prayers\": [[Liriel Baenre]], [[Sharlarra Vendreth]], and [[Thorn]] stop for a bite to eat at a tavern in [[Hlammach]], [[Impiltur]], and find more than food awaits them. A hunter seeking wolf pelts recognized Thorn as [[lythari]] and she challenges him to a duel. Liriel casts a [[resurrection (spell)|resurrection spell]] on the man's dragonhide boots and a [[red dragon]] forms to carry the man away. (Year: autumn of [[1371 DR]] {{Cite web|url=http://www.elainecunningham.com/books/forgotten-realms/the-best-of-the-realms-book-iii-the-stories-of-elaine-cunningham-info|author=[[Elaine Cunningham]]|title=The Best of the Realms Book III: The Stories of Elaine Cunningham|accessdate=2014-01-04}})
